phrs.translation: 加害某人;让某人不满意[亦作do someone harm]

sentences.sentence: His weight was harming his health.
sentences.translation: 他沉重的体重正危害着他的健康。

sentences.sentence: As a teenager I was self-harming regularly.
Farmers can use the spray to kill weeds without harming the soy crop.
sentences.translation: 农民们能用喷雾器来除草而不伤大豆作物。
